dataset.title: PMP Process Practice
notes: This dataset is intended for study/practice. It includes the PMBOK 6 (49 processes) names and their process group + knowledge area mappings.
It intentionally does not include PMBOK copyrighted explanatory text or full ITTO tables.

outputs: Final product, service, or result transition
